definition: to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
vicious/fierce/ominous/inauspicious/famine/variant of 兇|凶[xiong1]
terrible/fearful

sentences.english: Feng Shui is permeated with a for people to "stay out of trouble, " the main line.
sentences.chinese: 风水学贯穿着一条为人们“趋吉避凶”的主线。

sentences.english: The 'Evil Eye', symbolising good luck and protection sparkles brilliantly.
sentences.chinese: 璀璨夺目的邪恶之眼，是幸运与趋吉避凶的象征。

definition: to alter one's fate/to improve one's luck (e.g. by changing one's name or phone number)
misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
feng shui/geomancy
fate/predestination/divinatory art
good and bad luck (in astrology)
lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
to avoid evil spirits
to ward off evil spirits/mythical lion-like animal that wards off evil (also called 貔貅[pi2 xiu1])
ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
one's fortune (in astrology)
to drive out devils/exorcism
fate/portent/luck or disasters as foretold in the stars (astrology)
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
to avoid calamities
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
